description: Iviani Farm, located in Makueni County, Kenya, is a transformative initiative aimed at empowering the local community through sustainable agriculture. By addressing overproduction and waste, the farm provides a market for local farmers, particularly focusing on mangoes and other fruits. It emphasizes women's empowerment, offering training and employment opportunities. With a commitment to food sustainability, Iviani Farm processes and exports its products while ensuring that local needs are met, fostering economic growth and community development.
name: Iviani Farm
